Ingredients.5: 0.25 cup chopped mushrooms, or to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.12: 6  red bell peppers, tops and seeds removed

Ingredients.13: 0.25 cup grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

Directions.1: Bring brown rice and water to a boil in a saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, place a cover on the saucepan, and simmer until the rice is tender, about 40 minutes; transfer to a large mixing bowl.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Break ground beef into small pieces and place in the skillet. Add onion, mushrooms, and garlic; cook and stir until the beef is completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes. Mix beef mixture into brown rice.

Directions.4: Stir tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, tomato paste, and Italian seasoning into the rice mixture and season filling with salt and black pepper.

Directions.5: Arrange bell peppers in a baking dish. Spoon filling into bell peppers.

Directions.6: Bake in preheated oven until the peppers are tender, about 1 hour. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the stuffed peppers to serve.
